metadata.title: Add IronClaw Privacy-Focused AI Assistant
metadata.description: Adds IronClaw - an OpenClaw-inspired AI assistant framework written in Rust, with a strong focus on privacy and security. Uses WASM sandboxing for isolated job execution. Deployed as a compose stack (multi-container: app + PostgreSQL with pgvector) from the official repository.
metadata.author: Antigravity

operations.description: Add IronClaw privacy-focused AI assistant as a compose stack

template.title: IronClaw
template.name: ironclaw
template.description: Privacy-focused AI assistant framework written in Rust, inspired by OpenClaw. Features WASM sandbox isolation for secure per-job execution, an orchestrator/worker container pattern, and PostgreSQL 16 with pgvector for persistent memory. Runs as a non-root user. Requires a multi-stage build — deployed via the official docker-compose configuration.

env.name: POSTGRES_DB
env.label: Database Name
env.description: Name of the PostgreSQL database used by IronClaw.

env.name: POSTGRES_USER
env.label: Database User
env.description: PostgreSQL username for the IronClaw database.

env.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
env.label: Database Password
env.description: PostgreSQL password — change from the default for any non-local deployment.

env.name: RUST_LOG
env.label: Log Level
env.description: Rust logging level for the IronClaw service.

env.name: LLM_BACKEND
env.label: LLM Backend
env.description: AI provider / LLM backend configuration string.

template.note: IronClaw requires building Docker images locally from the repository — there is no pre-built image on Docker Hub. Run docker compose build before starting. Change POSTGRES_PASSWORD to a strong value before any network-exposed deployment. The main service is available on port 3000. Full documentation: github.com/nearai/ironclaw
